context_of_use: This use case allows an admin to modify system-level settings and application configuration.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control system access and customization
description: Enable admins to modify system-level settings and application configuration.
triggering_event: Admin requests to configure system settings.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and authorized to configure system settings.
postconditions: System settings are updated according to admin specifications.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to access system configuration.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to configure system settings.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on specific settings available for configuration.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to configure system settings → System displays configuration options.
2. Admin selects desired settings to modify → System updates the selected settings.
3. Admin confirms the changes → System saves the updated settings.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the admin is not authenticated, the system denies access to configuration options.
